This software is developed by 'theDNAse'. It uses Tasker as its coding language. Without Tasker (Google play link) and the Tasker App Factory (Google play link), this would never have been possible. A big thank you to members of tasker Google group and my all my friends for being the testers for this project and application.
Notice: To fully utilize the capability of TBM use Tasker and import the TBM profile instead.
